text: Wayne J. Molis (April 17, 1943 – March 24, 2002) was an American professional basketball player. A center/forward,Wayne Molis NBA, record, personal data, draft, finals, prizes, all-stars statistics he played professional basketball for two seasons due to knee injury, which ended his career. ==Personal life== Molis worked as a firefighter for eight years after his career ended.Wayne J.
